description: Returns information about the way your organization is configured in Security Hub. Only the Security Hub administrator account can invoke this operation.

nested_items.name: AutoEnable
nested_items.description: Whether to automatically enable Security Hub in new member accounts when they join the organization.

nested_items.name: MemberAccountLimitReached
nested_items.description: Whether the maximum number of allowed member accounts are already associated with the Security Hub administrator account.

nested_items.name: AutoEnableStandards
nested_items.description: Whether to automatically enable Security Hub default standards in new member accounts when they join the organization.

nested_items.name: OrganizationConfiguration
nested_items.description: Provides information about the way an organization is configured in Security Hub.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the organization uses local or central configuration.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Describes whether central configuration could be enabled as the ConfigurationType for the organization. If your ConfigurationType is local configuration, then the value of Status is always ENABLED.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: Provides an explanation if the value of Status is equal to FAILED when ConfigurationType is equal to CENTRAL.
